title: Activat burp suite pro with the old license after transfared to anothe account

profile.name: PortSwigger Web Security
profile.about: Burp Suite is the leading software for web security testing

vulnerability_information:
Hi team.
 
I made 2 accounts and purchased burpsuite pro.
The first account with this email :- ███████
The second account with this email :- ██████

I have opened a support ticket on  Jun 13, 2018 05:26PM and the message is :- 

Hi

Could you please add this account to my existing account


████
███████

to may another account

Email address: ██████████
███

and change the name from

licensed to Sara Badran [single user license]

To

Burp Suite Professional - licensed_to_Emad__Shanab_[single_user_license]

Because i made a purchase from my another account but my old license will expire in 2 month and i need to merge my new account with the old one in one license and please change the license hash because i feel Iam, get hacked

Thanks

Attachments | Burp_Suite_Professional_-_licensed_to_Sara_Badran__single_user_license_.txt 

The another license is:-

Attachments | Burp_Suite_Professional_-_licensed_to_Emad__Shanab__single_user_license_.txt 

I just need to merge the accounts or change the license name to me with new hash to avoid any one to use it .

Thanks
---------------------------------------------------------------------
And the team replied to me with this message:-- 

Hi Emad,

We have transferred the license key on █████ to █████████’s account.

Please let us know if you need any further assistance.


Now the license have transferred to my another account but i still can activate the burp with the old license with licensed to Sara Badran [single user license]

Now i have 2 licenses with one price and 2 different names. 

Please tell me if you need more information.

Thanks.

## Impact

This issue can lead to use 2 license with 2 different names with one price.
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi team.

I made 2 accounts and purchased burpsuite pro.
The first account with this email :- ███████
The second account with this email :- ██████

I have opened a support ticket on Jun 13, 2018 05:26PM and the message is :-

████
███████

to may another account

Email address: ██████████
███

and change the name from

licensed to Sara Badran [single user license]

To

Burp Suite Professional - licensed_to_Emad_Shanab[single_user_license]

Because i made a purchase from my another account but my old license will expire in 2 month and i need to merge my new account with the old one in one license and please change the license hash because i feel Iam, get hacked

Thanks

Attachments | Burp_Suite_Professional_-licensed_to_Sara_Badransingle_user_license.txt

The another license is:-

Attachments | Burp_Suite_Professional_-licensed_to_EmadShanabsingle_user_license.txt

I just need to merge the accounts or change the license name to me with new hash to avoid any one to use it .

Thanks

And the team replied to me with this message:--

Hi Emad,

We have transferred the license key on █████ to █████████’s account.

Please let us know if you need any further assistance.

Now the license have transferred to my another account but i still can activate the burp with the old license with licensed to Sara Badran [single user license]

Now i have 2 licenses with one price and 2 different names.

Please tell me if you need more information.

Thanks.

Impact

This issue can lead to use 2 license with 2 different names with one price.

activities.message:
Thank you for your report. Please refer to the bounty brief at https://hackerone.com/portswigger where we state that issues relating to licensing are out of scope.  

We investigated the issue you raised and found both licenses were purchased and the customer number and license were both validated before a transfer of the license had taken place. Please do not conduct any social engineering or phishing attacks as these are clearly out of scope of our bug bounty program.
activities.markdown_message:

Please do not conduct any social engineering or phishing attacks as these are clearly out of scope of our bug bounty program.

activities.message:
Hi
I have contacted the support team to take down the license because i am a lawyer and ethical hacker and i can not accept this for myself but i think i deserve something to make me happy for helping you.

I think this report a good example to make the hacker happy for helping
https://hackerone.com/reports/356566

Realy appreciate your kind response and thanks for your awesome tool.

Keep my best.

activities.message: Sorry this isn't a valid bug. Social engineering and attempting to bypass licensing restrictions are out of scope for our bug bounty program. Please refer to the bug bounty brief https://hackerone.com/portswigger to see what type of bugs we are looking for. Thanks.

activities.message: I've just read through your report and agree with my colleague's decision to close this as Not Applicable. If you wish to help in future - with our bounty, or any other - please carefully read the scope before starting work.

summaries.content: @egyptghost1 attempted to social engineer our staff to obtain an extra license. It didn't work, and as social engineering and attacks on licensing are both explicitly forbidden in our bounty brief the report was marked as NA.
summaries.content_html: @egyptghost1 attempted to social engineer our staff to obtain an extra license. It didn't work, and as social engineering and attacks on licensing are both explicitly forbidden in our bounty brief the report was marked as NA.
